function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Haphazard health seeking behavior in severe disease cases","Impact":"Delay in seeking appropriate care, leading to worsened health outcomes","Mitigation":"Public health education, community outreach, and improved access to healthcare facilities","Technologies":"Telemedicine, health-seeking apps, and digital health platforms","People":"Community members in low-resource settings","Owner":"Public health authorities and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Perception of inadequate or inappropriate care at hospitals","Impact":"Underutilization of hospital services, leading to untreated severe symptoms","Mitigation":"Quality improvement initiatives, patient feedback systems, and cultural competence training","Technologies":"Healthcare management software, patient feedback apps, and telehealth platforms","People":"Community members in low-resource settings","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and government health agencies"},{"Description":"Fear of seeking care due to messaging about no cure for COVID-19","Impact":"Reluctance to seek hospital care for severe COVID-19 symptoms, leading to poor health outcomes","Mitigation":"Clear communication about available treatment options, community health worker outreach, and psychological support services","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring devices, and telepsychiatry platforms","People":"Community members with severe COVID-19 symptoms","Owner":"Public health authorities and mental health organizations"}]}
